writing: Oh voyager, we, the people of Ganymede need your help.
The power hungry residents of Io have attacked us, and enlisted us as workers on their volcanic inner moon.
If you are reading this before 2030, there is still time!
But you must act quickly as we robots cannot survive much longer under the unexpected gravitational shift.
The labyrinth remains at your disposal as an outpost, just remember to close the boulder on your way out.
Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of their moon.
